sys_ui_page.description: UI Page to redirect the user to the CIR Portal using a dynamic portal name
sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<script>
		var ga = new GlideAjax('CIRCaseManagementAjax');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCirPortalName');
		ga.getXML(function (response) {
			var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
			window.location.href = '/' + answer;
		});
	</script>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: CIR_Switch_to_Portal
